I like Japanese culture and food. I even took the JLPT at N one level in Tokyo. My reading far outshines my speaking so the marks I lost in speaking were offset by those I gained in reading. Ny friend Amy too took the test. Shes a little weak in listening but strong on writing so the marks she gained in the writing part offset those she lost in the listening section. After the tests we spent money on clothes and shoes like it was going out of fashion. We went to a casino and gambled like it was going out of fashion. If you enjoy being in Japan you might spend money on food and cosmetic products like its going out of fashion. If you enter a casino you might gamble like it's going out of fashion like we did lol.

2019年第2回日本語能力試驗領取成績安排更新（香港）

因應新型冠狀病毒感染情況的最新發展，為減少人流，2019年第2回日本語能力試驗領取成績安排更新如下：

領取成績日期：
3月1日(日) － 3月7日(六) (10:00am-6:00pm) ← 保持不變，不需預約
3月23日(一) － 3月29日(日) (10:00am-6:00pm) ← 新增，不需預約

若未能在以上兩個時段領取成績者，請在2020年3月31日至2021年2月6日期間預約時間（只限逢星期二或星期六）領取。

其他領取成績詳情，請參考領取成績通知書（或本會網頁）內容。
https://www.japanese-edu.org.hk/jp/jlpt/zh/jlptb.html

另外，請到訪本會人士配戴口罩（請自備）。為節省等候時間，請自行撕下領取成績通知書下半部”回條”交給職員。

因應疫情，如領取成績時間有任何更改，請隨時留意本會網站的最新公佈。
